name: Acme Hospital Privacy Policy
description: This policy describes how Acme Hospital collects, uses, and discloses protected health information.

policies.name: Notice of Privacy Practices
policies.description: This policy describes the privacy practices of Acme Hospital.

provisions.name: Notice of Privacy Practices
provisions.description: Acme Hospital will provide patients with a Notice of Privacy Practices upon admission.
requirements: The Notice of Privacy Practices must be written in plain language.
The Notice of Privacy Practices must be provided to patients in a timely manner.
The Notice of Privacy Practices must be updated as needed.

provisions.name: Consent
provisions.description: Acme Hospital will obtain consent from patients before using or disclosing their protected health information.
requirements: Consent must be obtained in writing.
Consent must be specific and informed.

exceptions.name: Treatment Exception
exceptions.description: Acme Hospital may use or disclose protected health information without consent for treatment purposes.
exceptions.condition: The use or disclosure is necessary to provide treatment to the patient.
